seo_description_main: Restaurant Nostalgie - U Kamenných Lázní 557, Teplice-Sanov, Ústecký kraj, Czech Republic
about_text_1: Traditional Czech and international cuisine. Restaurant Nostalgie is one of the friendliest restaurants in Teplice. Teplice will become an even more pleasant place to stay if you visit the Nostalgie restaurant in addition to the monuments and galleries. Wine bar. Allotment. You have the possibility to arrange with us the rental of premises for organizing social events (private and corporate) - i.e. the rental of premises with the elegance of a restaurant with a garden.
about_text_2: We grill on an open fire in the traditional South American way. As a result, meat skewered has a pleasantly smoky taste and retains its juiciness.
about_text_3: We offer pleasant seating not only in the restaurant, but also in the garden or in the well-stocked Wine bar. Our restaurant is here for you and your special moments, whether private or business. Our Mediterranean cuisine combines the best ingredients and unusual ingredients from current global culinary trends. A delicious menu combined with exclusive wines adds to the feeling of a pleasant atmosphere.
seo_description_prices: Nízké ceny - profesionální svatební foto a videa - Vysotskyi Yaroslav, fotograf a kameraman

name: name
four_o_four_title: Omlouváme se, ale tato stránka neexistuje.
four_o_four_text: Je nám líto, ale nemůžeme najít stránku, kterou hledáte.
